name: 斩毒：黑与白（Narcotics Police:Black and White）
description: "Narcotics Police:Black and White" is a group of amateur production of the first person independent game, you will experience a drug trade caused by the hijacking case. Save the hostages, kill the criminal leader. And will be the police, undercover two perspectives to experience different experiences.
minimum_requirements: OS: win7 X86 Processor: intel i3以上 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX750以上 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 无 Additional Notes: 无
recommended_requirements: OS: win7  X64以上 Processor: intel i5及以上 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX950及以上 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 无 Additional Notes: 无
